name: Netlog: CleanUp
description:
Netlog: CleanUp hides...

- The google search form,
- and the friend invite box.

- The news,
- brands,
- polls,
- and contests components on the startpage, which can't be removed by a user self.

- The big footer on every page,
- the beta badges,
- and last but not least a lot of ads.
